name: zTabs
title: jQuery.zTabs()
description: This plugin creates tabs that support nested sub-tabs. The content of the tabs is typically loaded only when needed, AKA lavy-loading. zTabs works great for a tabbed interface of a web app.  The back, forward and refresh buttons of the browser are handled; tabs can be created and destoryed dynamically; tab content can be loaded from multiple sites via JSONP; many methods return deffered objects; and more.
